trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Kingsport
There were no other sightings in Kingsport on or around August 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the phone with my wife who is in Deputy, Indiana when both of us observed a unknown flying object. I am in Kingsport TN. My wife and I are over hundreds miles and both saw the exact same star like shape moving across the sky and both of us saw it disappearing at the same time. This thing had to be huge it seems lower then an airplane and and brighter then a star. I observed the airplane after i seen the unknown flying object and i could measure the different sized and shape. There was no flashing lights on the unknown flying object just a solid light.Crazy that we both saw this.
Summary: Bright star like object but much brighter, observed object traveling from southwest to northwest .
